name: nv-foundation
description: "this plugin for NuVous foundation. many shortcodes are available and its all free"

scripts.bundle: dir-archiver --src . --dest ../nv-foundation.zip --exclude .git .gitattributes .gitignore package.json package-lock.json node_modules *.sh webpack.config.js *.cache vendor tests .idea .github

author: David FU
